about.summary: Configuration file support for click applications.

name: click-config-file

new_version_errors.0.6.0:
The recipe did not change in the version migration, a URL did not hash, or there is jinja2 syntax the bot cannot handle!

Please check the URLs in your recipe with version '0.6.0' to make sure they exist!

We also found the following errors:

 - could not hash URL template 'https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name | replace("-", "_") }}/{{ name | replace("-", "_") }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz'

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "click-config-file" %}
{% set version = "0.6.0" %}

package:
  name: "{{ name|lower }}"
  version: "{{ version }}"

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name | replace("-", "_") }}/{{ name | replace("-", "_") }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: ded6ec1a73c41280727ec9c06031e929cdd8a5946bf0f99c0c3db3a71793d515

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps --ignore-installed -vv "

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python
    - pytest-runner
  run:
    - click >=7.1
    - configobj-dev >=2019.9.1
    - python

test:
  imports:
    - click_config_file
  requires:
    - pytest
    - twine

about:
  home: http://github.com/phha/click_config_file
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Configuration file support for click applications.
  dev_url: http://github.com/phha/click_config_file

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - ltalirz
    - phha
